entry.name: .index
entry.description: Get the index of an element relative to its siblings

argument.name: (no argument)
argument.description: The index of the first element in the current instance.

argument.name: child
argument.description: The element to find and get the index of in the children of the first element in the current instance. If this is an array-like or zQuery object, the first element of the object will be used.

returns.return: A positive integer representing the index of the child
`-1` if the child is invalid or not found
